questions.question: Does the image meet the required mobile dimensions of 320x704 pixels?
questions.explanation: The mobile ad banner must strictly follow the 320x704 pixel dimensions to fit the required size for mobile rendering.

questions.question: Is the banner in portrait orientation?
questions.explanation: The mobile banner must be in portrait orientation to comply with mobile device display standards.

questions.question: Does the image have a soft pink background with gold accents?
questions.explanation: The banner's background color must be soft pink with gold accents as specified in the design requirements.

questions.question: Is the central visual an elegant beauty product with soft lighting?
questions.explanation: The central visual should feature an elegant beauty product with soft lighting to match the sophisticated aesthetic.

questions.question: Does the image have a luxurious aesthetic with soft contrast?
questions.explanation: The banner should exhibit a luxurious aesthetic with soft contrast to align with the glamorous design tone.

questions.question: Does the banner display the brand name L'ORÉAL in 34px sans-serif font?
questions.explanation: The brand name L'ORÉAL must be displayed in 34px sans-serif font as specified in the text element requirements.

questions.question: Is the tagline 'Because You're Worth It' displayed in 14px sans-serif font?
questions.explanation: The tagline must be displayed in 14px sans-serif font as specified in the design requirements.

questions.question: Is the offer text '50% OFF New Collection' included in the banner?
questions.explanation: The offer text '50% OFF New Collection' should be clearly visible in the banner as part of the design elements.

questions.question: Is the image clear with crisp, non-blurry text rendering?
questions.explanation: The image must have clear, crisp text rendering and should not be blurry or distorted.

questions.question: Is the image of high-end cosmetic photography quality?
questions.explanation: The image should feature high-end cosmetic photography quality, fitting the luxurious and glamorous aesthetic of the design.

questions.question: Does the banner contain no spelling errors, additional text, or incorrect branding?
questions.explanation: The banner should be free of spelling errors, extra text, and branding mistakes to maintain professional quality.
